title: MCP Tool (Base)
description: Base MCP tool definition following Model Context Protocol specification

type.description: Identifier of the tool type in GTS format.

description.description: Human-readable description of what the tool does

inputSchema.description: JSON Schema defining the tool's input parameters

outputSchema.description: JSON Schema defining the tool's output structure on success (e.g., text, list, object, or null for no return value)

errorSchema.description: JSON Schema defining the tool's error response structure to distinguish errors from valid output
